description:
VirtualBox 7.1.4 open-source virtualization software is now available for download with initial support for Linux kernel 6.12 and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post VirtualBox 7.1.4 Adds Initial Support for Linux Kernel 6.12 and Other Linux Changes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: VirtualBox 7.1.4 Adds Initial Support for Linux Kernel 6.12 and Other Linux Changes

description:
KDE Plasma 6.2.1 is now available as the first maintenance update to the latest KDE Plasma 6.2 desktop environment series. Coming soon to a GNU/Linux distro near you!

The post KDE Plasma 6.2.1 Improves Support for XWayland Games, Fixes Various Bugs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Plasma 6.2.1 Improves Support for XWayland Games, Fixes Various Bugs

description:
Fwupd 2.0.1 Linux firmware update utiltiy is now available for download with a new API to allow GNOME Firmware to record devices for emulation and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post Fwupd 2.0.1 Adds API to Allow GNOME Firmware to Record Devices for Emulation appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fwupd 2.0.1 Adds API to Allow GNOME Firmware to Record Devices for Emulation

description:
Clonezilla Live 3.2 open-source and free disk cloning/imaging tool is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.11. Here’s what’s new!

The post Clonezilla Live 3.2 Disk Imaging/Cloning Tool Is Out Powered by Linux Kernel 6.11 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Clonezilla Live 3.2 Disk Imaging/Cloning Tool Is Out Powered by Linux Kernel 6.11

description:
Solus 4.6 distribution is now available for download powered by Linux 6.10 and featuring updated GNOME, KDE Plasma, Budgie, and Xfce editions. Here's what's new!

The post Solus 4.6 “Convergence” Released with Mesa 24.2, Experimental Software Centers appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Solus 4.6 “Convergence” Released with Mesa 24.2, Experimental Software Centers
